tags.name: zui-shell-nav
tags.description: The Shell collapsible side nav that houses the application's primary navigation. On medium screen sizes, the side nav automatically collapses to give users more screen real estate. Users can choose to expand it if they prefer.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Indicates whether the side nav is open or not. (MOBILE ONLY)

attributes.name: collapsed
attributes.description: Indicates when the side nav is collapsed.

attributes.name: collapse-label
attributes.description: For customizing the text for the collapse button at the bottom of the side nav. The default value is "Collapse."

properties.name: open
properties.description: Indicates whether the side nav is open or not. (MOBILE ONLY)

properties.name: collapsed
properties.description: Indicates when the side nav is collapsed.

properties.name: collapseLabel
properties.description: For customizing the text for the collapse button at the bottom of the side nav. The default value is "Collapse."
